content.raw: Actually, we have never used `ResetCustomTrajectory`, it was added in Gazebo as a public method to make sure that a plugin could call it to switch back to the default actor behaviour, but we have not had the opportunity to use it yet. We have a plugin that makes use of `SetCustomTrajectory` but it is quite similar to the one you will find in `ActorPlugin.cc`. We added a mechanism to define a path with waypoints in the plugin parameters, but the rest of the code is more or less the same.
content.html: Actually, we have never used ResetCustomTrajectory, it was added in Gazebo as a public method to make sure that a plugin could call it to switch back to the default actor behaviour, but we have not had the opportunity to use it yet. We have a plugin that makes use of SetCustomTrajectory but it is quite similar to the one you will find in ActorPlugin.cc. We added a mechanism to define a path with waypoints in the plugin parameters, but the rest of the code is more or less the same.
